definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
lit. to cover one's ears whilst stealing a bell/to deceive oneself/to bury one's head in the sand (idiom)
lit. whoever hung the bell on the tiger's neck must untie it (idiom)/fig. whoever started the trouble should end it
pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2

definition: lit. whoever hung the bell on the tiger's neck must untie it (idiom)/fig. whoever started the trouble should end it
pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2

sentences.english: In answer to the ring, appeared a page boy with a silver soup tureen.
sentences.chinese: 按过铃，一个小男仆就捧了一只盛汤的银器进来。

sentences.english: After Henry had rung the bell, I approached the platform.
sentences.chinese: 亨利打了铃，我走向讲台。

sentences.english: Lifting kettlebells has a different feel than lifting dumbbells.
sentences.chinese: 起重壶铃有比解除哑铃不同的感觉。

sentences.english: Should he or she elect to wear a belly button ring or a barbell?
sentences.chinese: 她或者他，选择佩戴肚脐环还是肚脐铃？

sentences.english: At this time, followed by a burst of bell, and everyone bolted back to the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这时，紧随一阵上课铃，大家又狂奔回教室。

sentences.english: Maintain a vertical or near vertical arm on your kettlebell side.
sentences.chinese: 始终保持持壶铃手臂垂直地面或接近垂直。

sentences.english: Clean a snatch-test-size kettlebell from the floor.
sentences.chinese: 将抓举测试所使用重量的壶铃从地面上翻起。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨铃蟾肽对新生兔小肠黏膜双糖酶活性的影响。

sentences.english: The shop smelled of sandalwood incense. The bell attached to the door rang as soon as I entered.
sentences.chinese: 店里有股檀香般的气味，我一进去门口的铃就响了。

sentences.english: Get up with adjustments bell, lights-out bell time function.
sentences.chinese: 具有调整起床铃，熄灯铃时间的功能。

sentences.english: Get up with adjustments bell, lights-out bell time function.
sentences.chinese: 具有调整起床铃，熄灯铃时间的功能。

sentences.english: Hardly had he rushed onto the platform when the departure bell rang.
sentences.chinese: 他刚冲到月台上开车铃就响了。

sentences.english: In fact everyday people are using kettlebells to pump up their workouts.
sentences.chinese: 现实上，常人使用的是壶铃，激发了他们的锻炼。

sentences.english: Keep your shoulder packed and your elbow locked on the kettlebell side. 4.
sentences.chinese: 保持持壶铃手臂一侧的肩部回收，肘部锁定。

sentences.english: Whenever he has registered letters for us, he will ring the doorbell.
sentences.chinese: 如果有挂号信要送给我们，他就会在门口按一下铃。

sentences.english: The lift bell pinged at the fourth floor.

definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
